title: Cosmata Premium Skincare E-commerce Website - Frontend Implementation

requirements.summary: Create sticky header with Cosmata logo, navigation menu, and icon group
acceptanceCriteria: Header remains fixed at top during scroll
Navigation links are clickable and functional
Search, account, and cart icons are visible and interactive
Color scheme matches brand palette: beige #F5EFE8, white, gold #C9A96E

file_operations.description: Create sticky header component with Cosmata logo on left, navigation menu (Home, Shop, About, Blog, Contact) in center, and icon group (search, account, cart with badge) on right. Implement sticky scroll behavior using Tailwind classes. Apply brand colors: soft beige #F5EFE8, white, gold #C9A96E. Cart icon displays item count badge from cart state.
Import and render Header component at the top of the application layout. Ensure header appears on all pages.

requirements.summary: Build hero section with headline, CTAs, and premium product image
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section spans full viewport width
Text content matches exactly as specified
Both CTA buttons are styled distinctly (primary vs secondary)
Layout is responsive with text stacking above image on mobile
Typography uses serif for headings and sans-serif for body

file_operations.description: Create hero section with left-aligned text content and right-side product image. Include headline 'Glow Naturally. Clinically Proven.', subtext 'Reveal your healthiest skin with Cosmata's science-backed skincare solutions.', primary CTA button 'Shop Now' linking to shop page, and secondary CTA button 'Explore Collection'. Use generated hero image from frontend/public/assets/generated/hero.dim_1920x1080.png. Apply modern serif font for headline and sans-serif for body text. Implement responsive layout that stacks vertically on mobile.
Create main homepage that composes all homepage sections: HeroSection, TrustBadges, ShopByCategory, BestSellers, IngredientHighlight, BeforeAfter, Testimonials, and BlogPreview components.

requirements.summary: Add trust badge section with three horizontal icons and labels
acceptanceCriteria: Three trust badges displayed in a horizontal row
Each badge has an icon and descriptive text
Badges are evenly spaced and centered
Responsive layout stacks badges vertically on mobile

file_operations.description: Create trust badges section with three horizontally aligned badges: 'Dermatologically Tested', '100% Safe Ingredients', '24/7 Customer Support'. Use icon placeholders (or simple SVG icons) with minimal rounded design and soft shadows. Implement responsive grid that stacks vertically on mobile.

requirements.summary: Create Shop by Category section with four category cards
acceptanceCriteria: Four category cards displayed in a grid
Each card is clickable and navigates to category page
Cards have rounded corners and soft shadows
Grid is responsive (4 columns desktop, 2 on tablet, 1 on mobile)

file_operations.description: Create category grid with four cards: Serum, Cleanser, Moisturizer, Face Wash. Each card displays generated product images from frontend/public/assets/generated/ (product-serum.dim_400x400.png, product-cleanser.dim_400x400.png, product-moisturizer.dim_400x400.png, product-facewash.dim_400x400.png). Cards are clickable and navigate to Shop page with category filter. Apply minimal rounded design with soft shadows. Implement responsive grid (4 columns desktop, 2 tablet, 1 mobile).

requirements.summary: Build best sellers product grid with Add to Cart functionality
acceptanceCriteria: Product grid displays 4 products per row on desktop
Each card shows all required information
'Best Seller' tag is visually prominent
Add to Cart button has hover effect
Grid is responsive (adjusts to 2 columns on tablet, 1 on mobile)
Clicking 'Add to Cart' adds product to cart state

file_operations.description: Create best sellers grid that fetches products using getBestSellers() from backend interface. Display product cards in 4-column grid (desktop) with product image, name, benefit description, price, and 'Add to Cart' button. Show 'Best Seller' urgency tag on cards. Implement hover effects on buttons. Call addToCart() backend function when user clicks 'Add to Cart'. Responsive grid adjusts to 2 columns (tablet) and 1 column (mobile).

Create custom hook that manages cart state using React Query. Provides functions to fetch cart (getCart()), add items (addToCart()), and clear cart (clearCart()) by calling backend interface methods. Returns cart data including items array and total, plus mutation functions for cart operations.

requirements.summary: Create ingredient highlight section with split layout
acceptanceCriteria: Section uses a two-column split layout
Left column displays skin texture image
Right column lists three ingredients with benefits
Text is clear, simple, and scientifically accurate without medical claims
Layout stacks vertically on mobile

file_operations.description: Create split layout section with left side displaying generated skin texture image from frontend/public/assets/generated/skin-texture.dim_800x600.png. Right side lists benefits of Vitamin C, Kojic Acid, and Niacinamide with short scientific explanations in simple English (avoiding medical claims). Implement responsive layout that stacks vertically on mobile.

requirements.summary: Add before and after section with image comparison slider
acceptanceCriteria: Interactive slider allows user to compare before/after images
Images show realistic skin improvement
Disclaimer 'Results may vary' is clearly visible
Slider is touch-friendly on mobile devices

file_operations.description: Create image comparison slider component showing before/after skin results. Use generated images from frontend/public/assets/generated/before-acne.dim_600x800.png and frontend/public/assets/generated/after-clear.dim_600x800.png. Implement interactive slider that allows dragging to compare images. Include disclaimer text 'Results may vary' below slider. Ensure touch-friendly interaction on mobile devices.

requirements.summary: Build testimonials section with customer review cards
acceptanceCriteria: Three testimonial cards displayed horizontally
Each card shows star rating (5 stars)
Review text is concise and readable
Cards use minimal design with soft shadows
Layout is responsive (stacks vertically on mobile)

file_operations.description: Create testimonials section with three customer review cards displayed horizontally. Each card includes 5-star rating display and short genuine review text. Use clean minimal card design with soft shadows and rounded corners. Implement responsive layout that stacks cards vertically on mobile.

requirements.summary: Create blog preview section with skincare tips article cards
acceptanceCriteria: Three blog article preview cards displayed
Each card includes article title and excerpt
Cards are clickable and link to full articles
Design matches minimal aesthetic with rounded corners
Responsive layout (3 columns desktop, 1 column mobile)

file_operations.description: Create blog preview section with three skincare tips article cards. Each card displays article title, excerpt, and links to blog page. Use clean minimal card design consistent with site aesthetic (rounded corners, soft shadows). Implement responsive grid (3 columns desktop, stacks to 1 column mobile).

requirements.summary: Build footer with newsletter signup, links, and contact info
acceptanceCriteria: Newsletter signup has email input field and submit button
Quick links include all main navigation items
Social media icons are visible and link to platforms
Contact information is clearly displayed
Payment icons (Visa, Mastercard, etc.) are shown
Footer layout is organized and responsive

file_operations.description: Create footer component with newsletter signup form (email input and submit button), quick links section (Home, Shop, About, Blog, Contact), social media icons, contact details, and secure payment icons (Visa, Mastercard, etc.). Use brand color palette and maintain premium minimal aesthetic with organized multi-column layout. Implement responsive stacking for mobile.
Import and render Footer component at the bottom of the application layout below all page content.

requirements.summary: Implement cart functionality with add, view, update, and checkout
acceptanceCriteria: Add to Cart button adds product to cart state
Cart icon shows item count badge
Cart page displays all added products
Users can update product quantities or remove items
Cart persists across page navigation
Checkout button navigates to checkout flow

file_operations.description: Create cart page that displays all cart items fetched using useCart hook. Show product details (image, name, price, quantity) for each cart item. Provide quantity update controls and remove buttons that call addToCart() and clearCart() backend functions. Display cart total. Include 'Proceed to Checkout' button that navigates to checkout page.

Create placeholder checkout page with order summary display. Show cart items, subtotal, and checkout form (name, email, address fields). Include 'Place Order' button that shows success message (no real payment processing per nonGoals).
Add routes for /cart (CartPage) and /checkout (CheckoutPage) to the router configuration. Ensure cart state is accessible across all pages via useCart hook.

requirements.summary: Ensure fully responsive design with mobile-first optimization and interactions
acceptanceCriteria: All sections render correctly on mobile, tablet, and desktop
Mobile layout prioritizes vertical stacking and readability
Smooth scroll is enabled for anchor links
Buttons and interactive elements have visible hover states
Touch targets are appropriately sized for mobile (minimum 44px)

file_operations.description: Add global CSS rules for smooth scroll behavior (scroll-behavior: smooth). Ensure base touch target sizing meets 44px minimum. Apply mobile-first responsive breakpoints using Tailwind utilities throughout all components.
Configure Tailwind with custom breakpoints if needed and ensure mobile-first approach. Verify responsive utility classes are available for all components.

requirements.summary: Apply consistent brand design system throughout the application
acceptanceCriteria: Color palette is consistently applied: beige #F5EFE8, white, gold #C9A96E
Typography hierarchy uses serif for headings, sans-serif for body
All components use rounded corners and soft shadows
White space is generous and layout feels uncluttered
Overall aesthetic feels premium, clinical, and minimal

file_operations.description: Extend Tailwind theme with brand colors: beige (#F5EFE8), gold accent (#C9A96E). Configure font families: modern serif for headings (e.g., Playfair Display, Lora) and clean sans-serif for body (e.g., Inter, Open Sans). Define custom shadow utilities for soft shadows. Set border radius defaults for rounded corners.

Import brand fonts from Google Fonts or similar. Apply global typography styles: serif headings, sans-serif body text. Set default background to soft beige (#F5EFE8). Define reusable utility classes for premium minimal aesthetic (generous spacing, soft shadows, rounded corners).
